data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Kisela Voda, North Macedonia.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kisela Voda, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Kisela Voda with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Kisela Voda, North Macedonia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Kisela Voda, North Macedonia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Spirit, help every believer in Kisela Voda, North Macedonia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kisela Voda to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kisela Voda, North Macedonia has a population of 84,700.

We estimate Kisela Voda has 141 people who might know Jesus, 52,349 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 32,209 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 600 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 141 believers in Kisela Voda to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
